name: ConnectedMarkets
description:
ConnectedMarkets.com is a professional services company providing Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engine Marketing (PPC), CMS-based website development and conversion testing solutions. Additionally, ConnectedMarkets provides SalesForce and related marketing automation customization and development services.
Grant has extensive experience in search engine optimization, paid search campaigns, conversion testing, online advertising, content management systems, CRM, marketing automation and e-commerce applications.
